snippet: A drug being developed for weight loss has been tested in patients with Prader-Willi syndrome, a condition marked by incessant, uncontrollable hunger, and other studies are in the wings.
abstract: Research into Prader-Willi syndrome, once obscure and neglected disease which gives people incessant, uncontrollable hunger, may shed light on much broader health problems of overeating and obesity; one drug being developed for weight loss by Zafgen has been tested in patients and other studies are in the wings.
lead_paragraph: A drug being developed for weight loss has been tested in patients with Prader-Willi syndrome, a condition marked by incessant, uncontrollable hunger, and other studies are in the wings.

headline.main: Seeking Clues to Obesity in Rare Hunger Disorder
headline.print_headline: Seeking Clues to Obesity in Rare Hunger Disorder
